Class JDBCConnection2

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gov.nih.nci.securityFW.db.JDBCConnection2
public class JDBCConnection2
extends java.lang.Object

Provides JDBC connection services which is based on the implementation of the Connection Pool via the Object Pool Pattern.
